card.title: Mercury Program
card.shortDescription: Conduct a spaceflight program. Worth 1vp for every 10 cards in your deck (rounded down)
card.longDescription: The Space Shuttle Enterprise (NASA Orbiter Vehicle Designation: OV-101) was the first Space Shuttle. It was built for NASA as part of the Space Shuttle program to perform test flights in the atmosphere.It was constructed without engines or a functional heat shield, and was therefore not capable of spaceflight. It was unveiled on September 17, 1976.
